passive_1: Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal [150 – 200|120 – 160] (based on level) bonus physical damage on-hit, increased by 0% – 50% (based on target's missing health), for up to [225 – 300|180 – 240] (based on level) bonus physical damage.

Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal [140 – 310|112 – 248] (based on level) bonus physical damage on-hit, increased by 0% – 50% (based on target's missing health), for up to [210 – 465|168 – 372] (based on level) bonus physical damage.

Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 140 – 310 (based on level) bonus physical damage on-hit, increased by 0% – 50% (based on target's missing health), for up to 210 – 465 (based on level) bonus physical damage.

Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 140 – 310 (based on level) bonus physical damage on-hit. Consuming stacks on the same target within 6 seconds increases the damage by 50%, up to 100%.

Basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 35 – 85 (based on level) (+ 65% AD) (+ 60% AP) bonus physical damage on-hit. Consuming stacks on the same target within 6 seconds increases the damage by 50%, up to 100%.

Basic attacks [on-hit|on-attack] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 35 – 85 (based on level) (+ 65% AD) (+ 60% AP) bonus physical damage on-hit. Consuming stacks on the same target within 6 seconds increases the damage by 50%, up to 100%.

Basic attacks [on-hit|on-attack] grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal 20 (+ 60% AD) (+ 45% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit. Consuming stacks on the same target within 6 seconds increases the damage by 50%, up to 100%.
Every third attack within 3 seconds deals 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

motd:
BugFix: • When Kayle uses Starfire Spellblade as a third attack, she will now properly deal true damage.

  • Jayce now properly deals true damage on his third attack with Mercury Cannon in all instances, not just when he crits.
Change: True damage is now affected by the on-hit modifiers of Aphelios' Onslaught, Katarina's Death Lotus, and Urgot's Purge.

passive_1: Every third attack within 3 seconds deals 60 (+ 45% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
motd: Bugfix: No longer interacts with Guinsoo's Rageblade's *Phantom Hit* for melee champions.

passive_1: Every third attack within 3 seconds deals 60 (+ 30% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
passive_4: Empowers your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
